files.name: .gitconfig
files.data:
[core]
	editor = \"C:\\Users\\Marti\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Microsoft VS Code\\Code.exe\" --wait
[filter "lfs"]
	clean = git-lfs clean -- %f
	smudge = git-lfs smudge -- %f
	process = git-lfs filter-process
	required = true
[user]
	name = X-Code-Software
	email = ews2909@outlook.com

files.name: Microsoft.PowerShell_profile.ps1
files.data:
Import-Module PSReadLine
Clear-Host
Write-Output "PowerShell V$((Get-Host).Version.Major).$((Get-Host).Version.Minor) with ShellUtils $(s verechostr)
"
Set-PoshPrompt -Theme ~/theme.omp.json

files.name: theme.omp.json
